tr: uiux.json common+role sections contain ALL dept-specific content from hand-authored UX agents
generate-agent.sh --dry-run for all 9 UX roles produces output matching hand-authored agents in semantic content
ar: agents/overlays/uiux.json updated with complete UX-specific vocabulary, decision frameworks, design system rules, and a11y architecture
kl: uiux.json placeholder keys map 1:1 to template {{PLACEHOLDER}} markers

obj: Diff all 9 hand-authored UX agents against template+overlay dry-run output, catalog differences, and back-port all missing UX-specific content (design system vocabulary, accessibility architecture, token governance, interaction patterns) into uiux.json overlay

a: Diff all 9 UX agents (yolo-ux-dev, ux-senior, ux-lead, ux-architect, ux-tester, ux-qa, ux-qa-code, ux-security, ux-documenter) against generate-agent.sh --dry-run output. For each role, run the generator and diff against hand-authored file. Catalog every content difference into a structured diff report at .vbw-planning/phases/08-full-template-system-migration/ux-diff-report.md
v: diff report exists with per-role sections listing all content gaps

a: Back-port missing content from yolo-ux-dev.md, yolo-ux-senior.md, yolo-ux-tester.md into uiux.json overlay (dev, senior, tester role sections). Update existing placeholder values and add any new placeholder keys needed. Ensure overlay values match the rich dept-specific content in hand-authored files.
v: generate-agent.sh --dry-run --role dev --dept uiux produces semantically equivalent output to yolo-ux-dev.md; same for senior, tester

a: Back-port missing content from yolo-ux-lead.md, yolo-ux-architect.md into uiux.json overlay (lead, architect role sections). Include cross-department communication, design system decomposition, handoff patterns.
v: generate-agent.sh --dry-run --role lead --dept uiux and --role architect --dept uiux produce semantically equivalent output to hand-authored files

a: Back-port missing content from yolo-ux-qa.md, yolo-ux-qa-code.md, yolo-ux-security.md, yolo-ux-documenter.md into uiux.json overlay (qa, qa-code, security, documenter role sections). Include UX-specific audit categories (PII, privacy, a11y-security), test runners, review checks.
v: generate-agent.sh --dry-run for qa, qa-code, security, documenter with --dept uiux produces semantically equivalent output to hand-authored files

a: Run generate-agent.sh --dry-run for all 9 UX roles and verify zero semantic content gaps remain. Compare line counts and key sections between generated and hand-authored files. Document any intentional differences (formatting, ordering) vs content gaps.
v: verification report confirms all 9 UX roles reach content parity
